Analysis¶

class MolearnAnalysis[source]¶
generate(crd)[source]¶

Generate a collection of protein conformations, given coordinates in the latent space.

Parameters:

crd – coordinates in the latent space, as a (Nx2) array

Returns:

collection of protein conformations in the Cartesian space (NxMx3, where M is the number of atoms in the protein)

get_all_dope_score(tensor, refine=True, processes=- 1)[source]¶

Calculate DOPE score of an ensemble of atom coordinates

Parameters:

processes – number of processes to spawn (parallel evaluation)

get_all_ramachandran_score(tensor, processes=- 1)[source]¶

Calculate Ramachandran score of an ensemble of atomic conrdinates

Parameters:

processes – number of processes to spawn (parallel evaluation)

get_dataset(key)[source]¶
Parameters:

key – key pointing to a dataset previously loaded with set_dataset

get_decoded(key)[source]¶
Parameters:

key – key pointing to a dataset previously loaded with set_dataset

get_dope(key, refined=True, processes=- 1)[source]¶
Parameters:

  • key – key pointing to a dataset previously loaded with set_dataset

  • refined – if True (default), return DOPE score of input and output structure both before and after refinement

  • processes – number of processes to spawn (parallel evaluation)

get_encoded(key)[source]¶
Parameters:

key – key pointing to a dataset previously loaded with set_dataset

Returns:

array containing the encoding in latent space of dataset associated with key

get_error(key, align=False)[source]¶

Calculate the reconstruction error of a dataset encoded and decoded by a trained neural network.

Parameters:

  • key – key pointing to a dataset previously loaded with set_dataset

  • align – if True, the RMSD will be calculated by finding the optimal alignment between structures (default False)

Returns:

1D array containing the RMSD between input structures and their encoded-decoded counterparts

get_ramachandran(key, processes=- 1)[source]¶
Parameters:

  • key – key pointing to a dataset previously loaded with set_dataset

  • processes – number of processes to spawn (parallel evaluation)

num_trainable_params()[source]¶
Returns:

number of trainable parameters in the neural network previously loaded with set_dataset

reference_dope_score(frame)[source]¶
Parameters:

frame – numpy array with shape [1, N, 3] with Cartesian coordinates of atoms

Returns:

DOPE score

scan_custom(fct, params, key)[source]¶
Parameters:

  • fct – function taking atomic coordinates as input, an optional list of parameters. Returns a single value.

  • params – parameters to be passed to function f

  • key – name of the dataset generated by this function scan

Returns:

grid scanning of latent space according to provided function, x, and y grid axes

scan_dope(processes=- 1, **kwargs)[source]¶

Calculate DOPE score on a grid sampling the latent space. Requires a grid system to be defined via a prior call to set_dataset.

Parameters:

processes – number of processes to spawn (parallel evaluation)

scan_error(s_key='Network_RMSD', z_key='Network_z_drift')[source]¶

Calculate RMSD and z-drift on a grid sampling the latent space. Requires a grid system to be defined via a prior call to set_dataset.

Parameters:

  • s_key – sting, label for RMSD dataset

  • z_key – sting, label for z-drift dataset

Returns:

NxN RMSD grid, NxN z-drift grid, x-axis values, y-axis values

scan_error_from_target(key, index=None)[source]¶

Calculate landscape of RMSD vs single target structure. Target should be a Tensor of a single protein stucture

scan_ramachandran(processes=- 1)[source]¶

Calculate Ramachandran scores on a grid sampling the latent space. Requires a grid system to be defined via a prior call to set_dataset.

Parameters:

processes – number of processes to spawn (parallel evaluation)

set_dataset(key, data, atomselect='*')[source]¶
Parameters:

  • data – PDBData object, containing atomic coordinates

  • key – string, label to be associated with data

  • atomselect – list of atom names to load. If ‘*’, all atoms are loaded.

set_decoded(key, structures)[source]¶
Parameters:

key – key pointing to a dataset previously loaded with set_dataset

set_encoded(key, coords)[source]¶
Parameters:

key – key pointing to a dataset previously loaded with set_dataset

set_network(network)[source]¶
Parameters:

network – a trained neural network defined in molearn.models

setup_grid(samples=64, bounds_from=None, bounds=None, padding=0.1)[source]¶

Define a point grid regularly sampling the latent space.

Parameters:

  • samples – grid size (build a samples x samples grid)

  • bounds_from – str, list of strings, or ‘all’. Name(s) of datasets to use as reference.

  • bounds – tuple (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax) or None

  • padding – define size of extra spacing around boundary conditions (as ratio of axis dimensions, default 0.1)

class MolearnGUI(MA=None)[source]¶
Parameters:

MA – MolearnAnalysis instance
